com.sindice.result
Class SearchResults

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      java.util.AbstractList<E>
          java.util.ArrayList<SearchResult>
              com.sindice.result.SearchResults
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<SearchResult>, java.util.Collection<SearchResult>, java.util.List<SearchResult>, java.util.RandomAccess
public class SearchResults
extends java.util.ArrayList<SearchResult>

This class models a list of SearchResult retrieved from Sindice.com to a given Query.

Author:
Milan Stankovic (milstan@gmail.com)
See Also:
